meanings.definition: To chill or cool something in advance.
meanings.sent1: I like to prechill my water bottle before going for a hike.
meanings.sent2: Remember to prechill the dessert before serving it.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to prechill the ingredients to speed up the cooking process.
meanings.sent4: She prechilled her excitement before the big surprise party.
meanings.sent5: The ice cream shop prechilled their freezers to keep the treats fresh.

meanings.definition: The act of chilling or cooling something before use.
meanings.sent1: Prechill is important for maintaining food safety.
meanings.sent2: The prechill of the drinks made the party more enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: The prechill of the ingredients made the cooking process smoother.
meanings.sent4: His prechill of the situation helped him stay calm under pressure.
meanings.sent5: The prechill of the room made it comfortable for the guests.
